Golf Symbol Book

Context

The main goals of this project were to develop a mark that fits into an existing symbol system, to understand the role of symbol systems and the process of developing any kind of simplified mark and create a process booklet to document the progress.

Design Process

  • Research symbol systems in general
    and the London 2012 symbol system
  • Choose new symbol to add into the system
  • Identify characteristics of the logosystem
  • Sketch thumbnail ideas
  • Refine thumbnails into sketches
  • Refine sketches into Illustrator
  • Refine best synbolform
  • Ideate, sketch, and layout booklet
  • Refine into Indesign
  • Completion

Design Decisions

The golf symbol of the subject swinging a driver in the middle of the swing was chosen because the symbol system included figures in the middle of their swings. For the booklet, the colors of the 2012 olympics were used in order to keep the style consistent
